markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 2" pfs="Standard">[Telekinetic Maneuver](/Spells.aspx?ID=333)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Attack" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=15" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Force" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=75" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 377 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 60 feet

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

With a rush of telekinetic power, you move a foe or something they carry. You can attempt to Disarm, Shove, or Trip the target using a spell attack roll instead of an Athletics check.
name: Telekinetic Maneuver

summary: Disarm, Shove, or Trip a creature telekinetically.
summary_markdown: Disarm, Shove, or Trip a creature telekinetically.
text: Telekinetic Maneuver Source Core Rulebook pg. 377 4.0 Traditions Arcane, Occult Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Range 60 feet Target 1 creature --- With a rush of telekinetic power, you move a foe or something they carry. You can attempt to Disarm, Shove, or Trip the target using a spell attack roll instead of an Athletics check.
